title: Problem-Based Online Language Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and understanding of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: A practical language proficiency enhancement course for learners in managerial/leadership roles.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze language-related challenges in real workplace scenarios and propose solutions.
Learners can effectively communicate with peers using online collaboration tools to complete problem-solving projects.
Learners can apply language expressions acquired during problem-solving to real work environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
